QuestData.Title: It Takes A Village
QuestData.Description: The villagers have been guarding Zouchin since the first attack. They are exhausted and many are injured.$b$bIf the Zandalari attack again the last thing we need is for the defenders to fall asleep on the job.$b$bRelieve them of their posts so that they might have time to heal and see their families.$b$bYou'll find them stationed around the village.
QuestData.LogDescription: Relieve the Exhausted Defenders from their guard posts.
QuestData.RewardText: Very good, $c! With the villagers rested we may yet stand a chance against the Zandalari.
